source_objects.title: Entrepreneurship
source_objects.description: Achieve your entrepreneurship dreams with courses on: lean start-up, developing a business plan, and launching your venture.

items.title: How To Grow A Profitable Construction Business
items.headline: Steve has made millions for Construction Companies. 10 Videos Including Worksheets, PDF Files and a 63,000 word eBook.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will be able to develop an effective business building strategy and marketing plan as part of your overall business strategy for your company
In this course you will learn up to date marketing principles that have been tried, tested and proven in various sectors of the construction industry and they work anywhere in the world

items.title: Make the Business Model Canvas a WEAPON
items.headline: Discover how to have a 360Â° vision of your business allowing you to understand, create and work as a strategist.
objectives_summary: Make the difference on the market by understanding and using the Business Model Canvas
Improve significantly the way you do business
Free your mind leaning on a powerful tool

items.title: The Fundamentals Of 3D Printing

visible_instructors.title: Jeffrey Ito
visible_instructors.job_title: Owner of Lithium Gold Ventures, LLC
visible_instructors.name: Jeffrey

items.headline: A comprehensive guide to getting started with a 3D printer including how to design, share and monetize your first print.
objectives_summary: Learn the fundamentals of 3D printing including the history, methods, kinds of 3D printers, how to design your own models and share them around the world
Create their own 3D models using CAD software
Explore new business models that take advantage of 3D printing and the customizability aspect

items.title: Outsource to a Virtual Assistant: Systems, Hire & Manage
items.headline: Outsource to a virtual assistant (10+ hours a week) and do more of what you love. Practical outsourcing advice.
objectives_summary: Outsource tasks to a virtual assistant for less than $5 an hour
Spend less than 1 hour a week managing a virtual assistant
Save 10+ hours a week and spend this time on other income-generating activities

items.title: Business 101: CashFlow Forecasting For Service Business
items.headline: **Template Included** Learn how to use Excel to forecast and budget in your service business. Learn the Ins and Outs
objectives_summary: Learn From A Top Rated Instructor Who Has Been Teaching On Udemy Since 2013 and Taught Over 100,000 Students!
Template Download: Download the Cash Flow Budget Template at the Course End
Build an Effective Cash Flow Budget

items.title: Uber: Learn to Max Out your Uber Rideshare Profits

visible_instructors.title: Brian Cliette
visible_instructors.job_title: Digital Growth Marketer, Entrepreneur, Content Creator
visible_instructors.name: Brian

items.headline: Maximum Uber Ridesharing Profits: How To Increase Your Earnings As A Uber Driver. How to apply, to pass your  1st ride.
objectives_summary: You will learn the necessary information and skills to set up an account, as well as the process of becoming a successful driver.
You will learn how to choose the best uber designation for your vehicle (what type of partner you are going to be).
You will learn: the legal difference between being a "contractor" and an "employee" of uber.

items.title: Ultimate Guide To Working With Brokers

visible_instructors.title: Carrier Pal LLC
visible_instructors.job_title: Owner-Operator and Small Fleet Carrier Advocate
visible_instructors.name: Carrier Pal

items.headline: The Definitive Business Guide For Owner-Operator and Small Fleet Carriers
objectives_summary: Identify the required documentation to set up with a brokerage company to do business
Learn ways to build trust and rapport with brokers in order to maintain high performance ratings  and increase profitability
Gain awareness of what to do before you get on the road to ensure that the transaction runs smoothly and efficiently

items.title: The Step By Step Guide To Your Own Subscription Box Business
items.headline: Learn how to make a profitable subscription box business with real world examples and actionable tips
objectives_summary: At the end of my course students will be able to start and run their own subscription box business while avoiding typical pitfalls, because I have already done the hard work for you.

items.title: Automate Your Hypnotherapy and Meditation Business (No. 2)

visible_instructors.title: Cha~zay Sandhriel Ph.D.

items.headline: A course to help current hypnotherapists and energy healers to create a passive income stream with their meditations.
objectives_summary: Know how to automate placing your meditations on the internet for sale.
Create passive income streams with your pre-recorded meditations.
Technology needed to set-up your passive income streams with meditations.

items.title: Start a Yoga Studio - Business Plan and Document Package
items.headline: How to start and finance a Yoga Studio using business plan template documents with example to create a Business Plan
objectives_summary: Have a full business plan for setting up a Yoga Studio and for approaching investors.

Have a full Excel Financial Projection Model for starting a Yoga Studio and for approaching investors. - Students will understand the start-up costs, income, expenses and profits for their Yoga Studio
Have a full Pitch Deck for setting up a Yoga Studio and for approaching investor

items.title: TIKTOK Masterclass: Build Your Business With TIKTOK
items.headline: ATTENTION SOLOPRENEURS: TikTok for your business is where you can unleash your brand's creative side.
objectives_summary: TIK TOK: TikTok Mobile and Desktop App
TIK TOK: Setting Up Your TikTok Profile
TIK TOK: Adding TikTok Contacts

items.title: Start Your Own Business, Be Your Own Boss
items.headline: Learn how to start and grow your own small business. Turn your passion into a profitable business.
objectives_summary: How to set a business up and get running
How to market your products and close your sales
How to grow and what comes next once you get going

items.title: Patent, Trademark, Copyright Law Basics for Creative People
items.headline: How authors, artists, entrepreneurs and inventors can protect their creative work
objectives_summary: Be able to protect your creative work using patents, trademarks and copyrights---with or without needing a lawyer

Business MBA in only 1 hour!

items.title: Learn How to Start a Business Fast
items.headline: Complete guide to starting a business including all the legal, accounting, tax, and bookkeeping information you'll need!
objectives_summary: Learn how to form an LLC, file for a federal employer identification number, setup bookkeeping software, and compile corporate record book for a business
